sen.j: 正親町三条 公厚（おおぎまちさんじょう きんたる、文政3年1月2日 (旧暦)（1820年2月15日） - 文政5年1月12日 (旧暦)（1822年2月3日））は、江戸時代後期の廷臣。
sen.e: Kintaru OGIMACHISANJO (February 15, 1820 - February 3, 1822) was a retainer of the Imperial Court during the latter half of the Edo period.
Kintaru OGIMACHISANJO (February 15, 1820 - February 3, 1822) was a retainer of the Imperial Court during the latter half of the Edo period.
Kintaru OGIMACHISANJO (February 15, 1820 - February 3, 1822) was a retainer of the Imperial Court during the latter half of the Edo period.

sen.j: 父は参議正親町三条実義。
sen.e: His father was Sangi (councillor) Saneyosi OGIMACHISANJO.
His father was Sangi (councillor) Saneyosi OGIMACHISANJO.
His father was Sangi (councillor) Saneyosi OGIMACHISANJO.

sen.j: 母は松本藩主松平光年の娘。
sen.e: His mother was the daughter of Mitsutsura MATSUDAIRA, the lord of Matsumoto Province.
His mother was the daughter of Mitsutsura MATSUDAIRA, the lord of Matsumoto Domain.
sen.cmt: 「Matsumoto Province」を「Matsumoto Domain」に変更しました。
sen.e: His mother was the daughter of Mitsutsura MATSUDAIRA, the lord of Matsumoto Domain.

sen.j: 弟に大納言正親町三条実愛がいる。
sen.e: His younger brother was Dainagon (chief councilor of state) Sanenaru Ogimachi-SANJO.
His younger brother was Dainagon (chief councilor of state) Sanenaru OGIMACHISANJO.
His younger brother was Dainagon (chief councilor of state) Sanenaru OGIMACHISANJO.

sen.j: 正親町三条家の当主に数えられるが、わずか3歳で卒去。
sen.e: He was one of the family heads of the Ogimachisanjo family, however, he died at the age of three.
He was one of the family heads of the Ogimachisanjo family, however, he died at the age of three.
He was one of the family heads of the Ogimachisanjo family, however, he died at the age of three.

sen.j: 最終官位は従五位下だった。
sen.e: His last official rank was Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade).
His last official rank was Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade).
His last official rank was Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade).
